description:
Puzzle together in this modern yet familiar online stacker. Play against friends and foes all over the world, or claim a spot on the leaderboards - the stacker future is yours!
**Features**:
* Better performance on most devices — performance patches pre-applied
* Discord Rich Presence integration — show what you're playing
* Skip the login screen and get in the game quicker
* Place TETR.IO in the Start Menu and taskbar
* Play singleplayer modes without an Internet connection
* No BS — no background processes or spyware, just TETR.IO in a nice client with some extra features
summary: Desktop client for the online multiplayer Tetris clone TETR.IO
author: osk
